title: krakow2000
author: krakow2000
content: I use alot of Cornix for telegram signal group with good results but... it's any bot you can instal on ur pc/server and run with telegram signals like Cornix?? Read signal, open signal with settings, trailling... just like or similar to Cornix??

comments.author: Apraun Seupot
comments.body: I think, actually quite a few bots out there that offer similar functionality to Cornix, allowing you to read signals, open trades with specific settings, and trail stops. Some popular options include Zignaly, 3Commas, and Cryptohopper.And, each bot has its own unique features and pricing structure, so it's important to do your research and figure out which one best fits your needs. But overall, I think it's definitely possible to find a bot that allows you to run Telegram signals on your own pc or server.
